changelog:
Change devMenu prompt system. So you must use latest version of my "redemrp_menu_base"(https://github.com/abdulkadiraktas/redemrp_menu_base) script.
Deleted all temp missons.
Change language system. Check lang folder.
Job check only works when player first login. This issue fixed.
  Updated the job control script to run when you restart it as well. You won't need to select characters again after a reboot.
Update verification system.
I Fixed the camera transition issue.I Fixed the camera transition issue.

old.changelog: Update verification system for cfxre identifier

1-Fix "blossom-earth-jupiter" crash issue.
2-You can change notification system. In conf.lua.
You can convert redemrp framework to your own framework. Check api\api-server.lua file for more information.

Train is deleted when the player is disconnected from server. 
 deletetrain command has been updated. You don't need to drive the train to use this command.

Key group system activated.
Fixing inventory open issue.

Added animated market for tocoord 
Added set train maks speed option 
Some fixes 
Dev mode default set false 
fix some typo 
fix some bugs
